chapter.title: Install and configure the OpenStack clients
chapter.para: The following sections contain information about working with the OpenStack clients. Recall: in the previous section, you used the keystone client.
You must install the client tools to complete the rest of the installation.
Configure the clients on your desktop rather than on the server so that you have a similar experience to your users.

section.title: Create openrc.sh files
section.para: As explained in , use the credentials from and create the following PROJECT-openrc.sh files:

listitem.para: demo-openrc.sh for the normal user: export OS_USERNAME=demo export OS_PASSWORD=DEMO_PASS export OS_TENANT_NAME=demo export OS_AUTH_URL=http://controller:35357/v2.0
